content: He then decided to try the effect of hypnotizing her, for, as all psychopathologists are aware, hypnotism, when it is possible to use it, is an unrivaled agency for recovering lost memories.
translations: ita:Ha deciso allora di provare l'effetto dell'ipnosi perché, come tutti gli psicopatologi sanno, l'ipnotismo, quando è poss
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Cangarejo (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
